I'm honored to be a member of the Synergy project team.

Below, you'll find a brief summary of our project. To access a detailed project description, please go to [SYNERGY's Project Lab](https://emu-hacettepe-analytics.github.io/emu430-fall2023-team-synergy).

**Summary**

In our project, we have detailed data about museums and libraries in various provinces of Turkey. Using this data, we aim to perform analyzes by determining the average, maximum and minimum values of the number of museums and libraries in each province.
